attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for a dog to injure or kill another animal.
attributes.additional_details: I was bitten by a pack of dogs that got loose, who tried to kill my dog whilst out for a walk.
attributes.background: Make it a criminal offence for a dog to injure or kill another animal.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548366
